DOC.brief_title: Energy Specific Far Infrared Radiation Treatment Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: Erectile dysfunction characterize regular repeat inability obtain maintain erection . Erection depend complex interaction psychological , neural , vascular endocrine factor . We propose non-drug non-invasive radiation treatment enhancement erection .
